title: [Large-Scale] Personalized Mathematics Learning Design Utilizing Islamic Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of Islamic educational philosophy
context.additional_context: A mathematics education course for pre-service/in-service teachers, applying the embodiment concept of Islamic pedagogy to personalized learning, implemented in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core principles of Islamic pedagogy (e.g., tawakkul-trust, ihlas-sincerity) to project-based mathematical problem-solving
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers and mentors to design and implement individualized mathematics learning roadmaps
Learners can create mathematics educational materials reflecting Islamic knowledge embodiment (connecting physical and spiritual practices)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
